attributes.action: make high court judges an elected position, voted in a regular national election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure a bill is passed enforcing all high court judges have to be elected into their position. This should be brought in on a national and local scale ensuring that the powers at be enforcing the consequences of breaking the law and order in our country are chosen by British citzens, rather than the hierarchy and the government.
